GlossaryTerm.TermName: stage IV nonmelanoma skin cancer on the eyelid

TermDefinition.DefinitionText: The tumor has spread to distant parts of the body.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "stage IV nonmelanoma skin cancer on the eyelid"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "cáncer de piel no melanoma del párpado en estadio IV"

GlossaryTerm.SpanishTermName: cáncer de piel no melanoma del párpado en estadio IV

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: El tumor se diseminó hasta partes distantes del cuerpo.
